comment: She is an amazing spanish teacher. She know exactly how to teach, and what to teach. You have to buy the book and the online access because you will use it a lot. As long as you do what she says and come to class you ill learn spanish with you really realizing how much you have learned!

Mrs. Wikinson is a pretty good teacher. Having the book is a MUST because you use it every class without fail. Her tests are really easy and the board-made final is the same, easy. No cellphones or laptops, she hates those. DO YOUR HOMEWORK! Online is easy, but those written homework pieces are essential to your grade.
